WASHINGTON, D.C. - NOVEMBER 19: Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi speaks during the unveiling of the official portrait of Former Speaker of the House John Boehner at the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C. on November 19, 2019. HILL

column7:
WASHINGTON, DC - OCTOBER 16, 2019: Speaker of the House Rep. Nancy Pelosi (D-CA), center, House Majority Leader Steny Hoyer (D-MD), left, and Senate Minority Leader Sen. Chuck Schumer (D-NY) speak to the press after a meeting between President Donald Trump and congressional leadership, at the White House in Washington, D.C., on October 16, 2019. CREDIT: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The New York Times
NYTCREDIT: T.J. Kirkpatrick for The New York Times
